text: Chicago Fire FC (officially Chicago Fire Football Club, and before 2020 Chicago Fire Soccer Club) is a soccer team that plays in Major League Soccer in Chicago. They started in 1998 and won an MLS Cup in that year. The club is named after the Great Chicago Fire of 1871. == League title == * Major League Soccer : 1 ** 1998 == League position == Season League Position 1998 Major League Soccer Champions 1999 Major League Soccer Quarterfinals 2000 Major League Soccer Final 2001 Major League Soccer Semifinals 2002 Major League Soccer Quarterfinals 2003 Major League Soccer Final 2004 Major League Soccer 5th / East 2005 Major League Soccer Semifinals 2006 Major League Soccer Quarterfinals 2007 Major League Soccer Semifinals 2008 Major League Soccer Semifinals 2009 Major League Soccer Semifinals 2010 Major League Soccer 4th / East 2011 Major League Soccer 6th / East 2012 Major League Soccer Knockout Round 2013 Major League Soccer 6th / East 2014 Major League Soccer 9th / East 2015 Major League Soccer 10th / East 2016 Major League Soccer 10th / East 2017 Major League Soccer Knockout Round == References == Category:American soccer teams Category:Sports organizations based in Chicago Category:1997 establishments in the United States Category:1990s establishments in Illinois Category:Major League Soccer teams
title: Chicago Fire FC
